description:
http://anidb.net/ch10070 [Bulma] is a girl from the city with a wish. In order to fulfill her wish, she set out to collect seven mystical spheres known as the Dragon Balls. It is said that, when the seven Dragon Balls are brought together, one may invoke their lord, http://anidb.net/ch7015 [Shenron], an almighty dragon god who can and will grant any wish, but only one.
In Bulma`s search, she traveled far and wide, until one day she met a strange but very strong boy with a tail. The boy, http://anidb.net/ch2116 [Son Gokuu], lived by himself in a small place in the middle of the wilderness. It turns out that Gokuu has a Dragon Ball, but he will not let go of it, no matter what; after all, that Dragon Ball is his only memento of his late grandfather, the man who raised him.
Being unused to dealing with other people and never having seen a female his whole life, Gokuu is highly tactless. However, Bulma sees the value of having his strength to protect her in her journey and realises that he won`t let give away his Dragon Ball easily, so she convinces him to go with her. As she seeks the remaining Dragon Balls in order to make her wish come true, he embarks on a quest to see the world and become stronger; thus begins their a journey together, a journey in which they will face many perils and meet many people, friends and foes alike.
— written by Hinoe

titles.title: โงกุนแต่งงาน

REGULAR.description:
Krillin and Junior mix it up in a high-flying battle the audience won`t soon forget, and Yamcha suffers a blow to his manhood when he underestimates the bumbling fighter known as Hero.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Shen, un candidato fuera de lo común
บุรุษลึกลับ เช็ง

REGULAR.description:
Hero unveils his true strength - and hints at his true identity - when Yamcha desperately conjures a powerful attack. Next up, Tien and Goku trade crushing blows in a not-so-friendly rematch!
Source: hulu

titles.title: Songoku contre Ten Shin, deuxième rencontre
โงกุนพบเทนชินฮังอีกครั้ง
激闘ふたたび! 悟空VS天津飯

REGULAR.description:
Goku and Tien dazzle the crowd with a midair display of martial arts madness! Tien`s incredible speed gives him the upper hand until Goku slips into something more comfortable.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Goku y Ten Shin Han se enfrentan de nuevo
พลังที่แท้จริง

REGULAR.description:
Fighting Goku at top speed is too much for one man to handle, so Tien calls upon a technique capable of turning a lone fighter into an army of destruction! Death has many faces, and Goku`s about to meet them all!
Source: hulu

titles.title: Todos para uno y uno para todos
Tous pour un, un pour tous
เทนชินฮํง 8 คน

REGULAR.description:
The Evil Containment Wave takes center stage when the two most mysterious fighters in the tournament meet in a ferocious semifinal match that quickly escalates to all-out warfare.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Docchi ga Tsuyoi!? Kami vs Piccolo Daimaou
Quen é Máis Forte?! Deus Vs. Rei Demo Piccoro
ใครเก่งกว่ากัน พระเจ้า หรือปีศาจ
どっちが強い!? 神VSピッコロ大魔王

REGULAR.description:
Titles and tournaments take a backseat as Goku faces his nemesis in a battle that will determine the fate of the world! Should Goku fail to defeat the monstrous mauler, humanity will tremble at the feet of Piccolo!
Source: hulu

titles.title: El lucha por el futuro del mundo
Kono Yo no Unmei o Kakete!
O Futuro Deste Mundo Está en Xogo!
การต่อสู้เพื่อชะตากรรมของโลก
この世の運命を 賭けて!

REGULAR.description:
Goku has the power to end Junior`s ruthless reign of terror, but he cannot destroy the monster without sacrificing Kami! Goku`s hands appear tied until Krillin saves the day with a sudden stroke of genius!
Source: hulu

titles.title: ออกมาแล้ว สุดยอดพลังคลื่นเต่า
でた! 究極の超カメハメ波

REGULAR.description:
The audience erupts into mass pandemonium after Junior reveals his true identity! While the world searches for a place to hide, Goku turns his attention to defeating Piccolo - a challenge that keeps getting bigger.
Source: hulu

titles.title: A Técnica de Súper Xigante do Gran Rei Demo Piccoro
วิชาขยายร่างยักษ์ของจอมปีศาจพิคโกโร่
ピッコロ大魔王 超巨身術

REGULAR.description:
After a savage beating at the hands of Piccolo, Goku fights back with a double dose of internal punishment for the green fiend. The monster`s next attack is lethal to say the least, but Goku`s evasive manoeuvres leave Piccolo painfully short-handed!
Source: hulu

titles.title: กับดักของโงกุน

REGULAR.description:
Eager to end his brutal match with Goku, Piccolo unleashes a technique of unprecedented power! In the aftermath of the monster`s onslaught, Goku`s friends are elated to find their hero still standing, but how much longer can he continue?
Source: hulu

titles.title: ชัยชนะไม่ใช่ของง่าย

REGULAR.description:
Humanity`s fate hangs in the balance as Goku and Piccolo battle for the title of world`s greatest martial artist! Kami has a sure-fire way to swing the momentum in Goku`s favor, but it requires the ultimate sacrifice!
Source: hulu

titles.title: Conseguiuno! É o Máis Forte do Mundo
บุรุษที่เก่งที่สุด
やった! 地球上最強の男

REGULAR.description:
Goku and Chichi`s wedding plans are put on hold when an earthquake sparks an uncontrollable blaze that threatens to incinerate the Ox King - and Chichi`s wedding dress!
Source: hulu

titles.title: Honoo no Naka no Wedding Dress
O Vestido de Noiva no Interior das Chamas
ชุดแต่งงานกลางเปลวเพลิง
炎の中の ウェディングドレス

REGULAR.description:
Goku and Chichi`s quest to build a new Basho Fan leads them to the center of a deadly volcano. Deep within the molten-mountain lives a mystical flame-guzzling bird that carries the key to saving the Ox-King!
Source: hulu

While the Ox-King struggles to escape the mysterious flames threatening to consume his kingdom, Goku and Chichi journey to a treacherous mountain peak protected by a bone-chilling curse!
Source: hulu

titles.title: Chichi no Hanayome Shugyou no Okage Desu
Ó Adestramento nas Tarefas do Fogar de Chichi...
เพราะการฝึกเป็นแม่บ้านของจีจี้แท้ๆ
チチの花嫁修行の おかげです

REGULAR.description:
When the Basho Fan fails to extinguish the blaze surrounding the Ox-King`s castle, Goku and Chichi must venture into a horrifying world of darkness in search of the Magical Furnace!
Source: hulu

titles.title: Dáte Présa, Goku! O Misterio da Montaña dos Cinco Elementos
La montaña de los cinco elementos
ปริศนาแห่งทางสู่โลกหน้า
いそげ悟空! 五行山のなぞ

REGULAR.description:
Goku and Chichi reach the Magical Furnace, but its guardian refuses to extinguish the flame. To spare the Ox-King from certain death, Goku takes matters into his own hands, venturing into the heart of the blaze!
Source: hulu

titles.title: Moeru Frypan Yama! Isshun no Kesshikou
O Monte Tixola Está Ardendo! Unha Acción Arriscada
เสี่ยงตายดับไฟประลัยกัลป์
燃えるフライパン山! 一瞬の決死行

SPECIAL.description:
Included as a bonus feature in the Japanese `Dragon Box` DVD set, it showcases some of the censorship from the early episodes of American release of Dragon Ball. There are four small clips, each introduced in a comical fashion, essentially mocking the American censorship.
The first clip is from the original 1995 dub and shows Goku catching the fish with his digital undies! "From the 1st episode `Bulma and Son Goku` Underwear was put on."
The second clip is from the 2001 dub and shows Goku diving after Oolong in his digital undies, as well as the "fish full of dollars" scene! "From the 5th episode `The Strong Villain of the Desert, Yamcha` The underwear becomes a roll of bills!"
The third clip is from the 2001 dub and shows Goku and Chi Chi are flying on Kinto-Un. Chi Chi seemingly throws Goku off the cloud for no apparent reason... "From the 7th episode `Gyuumao of Mount Frypan` Goku does not do pat-pat..."
The final clip is from the 1995 dub, and shows the scene where Chi Chi throws her helmet-knife-thingy at Kame-sennin, and he shows her his license to prove that he`s a real hermit. "From the 8th episode `Kame-sennin`s Kamehameha` Kame-sennin`s license"
Source: Kanzenshuu

titles.title: アメリカ版ドラゴンボール

WIKIPEDIA_JP: ドラゴンボール_(アニメ)

titles.title: ดราก้อนบอล
